death.attack.shadow_orb: %1$s perished after being barraged by %2$s's Shadow Orbs

tooltip.soulsweapons.infinity_descriptio: - Item is not lost when thrown.

tooltip.soulsweapons.storm_stomp_descrip: - Knocks away targets not hit by ¬ßeLightning¬ßr.
tooltip.soulsweapons.pure_moonlight_desc: - Use to summon 3 ¬ß3Moonlight Beams¬ßr in split directions.
tooltip.soulsweapons.dragon_staff_descri: - Shoot projectile that spawns ¬ß5Purified Dragon Mist¬ßr.

tooltip.soulsweapons.vengeful_fog_descri: - Using while crouching concentrates the mist,

tooltip.soulsweapons.wabbajack_descripti: - Summon random projectiles with random effects.

tooltip.soulsweapons.soul_release_descri: - Use to summon familiar with strength
tooltip.soulsweapons.soul_release_wither: - Use to release a ¬ß4Wither Skull¬ßr with your harvested

tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_1: Press V by default to collect the souls of your bound
tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_2: summons back into your Soul Harvesting Weapon if in hand.
tooltip.soulsweapons.collect_3: This includes everything from Remnants to the Soulmasses.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lunar_herald_descri: - Use to gain the ¬ßdLunar Herald¬ßr effect. Hold
attack to shoot moonlight beams with the effect.
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_robes_descrip: and Dirt blocks for a short duration.
tooltip.soulsweapons.permafrost_descript: damaging and spreading ¬ßbPermafrost¬ßr to mobs nearby.
tooltip.soulsweapons.heavy_throw_descrip: - Throw the axe to ¬ßbPermafrost¬ßr all mobs hit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.crit_description_2: targets with less than ¬ßc20% Health¬ßr left.
tooltip.soulsweapons.disable_heal_descri: - Post hit will inflict ¬ß5Cursed Wounds¬ßr, making
the target unable to heal for said time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.skofnung_stone_desc: while also empowering ¬ßfSkofnung¬ßr if in hand.
tooltip.soulsweapons.sharpen_description: - Use the ¬ß5Skofnung Stone¬ßr while this sword
is in hand to empower this weapon. It will then
gain more attack damage and ¬ßcBleed¬ßr post hit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.mjolnir_lightning_c: - Use while sneaking to smash the ground,
that spreads outwards from the user.
tooltip.soulsweapons.weatherborn_descrip: - This becomes empowered when it is ¬ß9Raining¬ßr.
tooltip.soulsweapons.mjolnir_throw_descr: - Throw the weapon at enemies, summoning
lightning on them if the skies are clear.
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_descrip: - Use to summon the ¬ßbSword of Freyr¬ßr to fight
by your side. Press keybind or right click the
sword to return the item to yourself. Press
other keybind to switch between stationary
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_1: Return keybind is R by default, stationary keybind
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_2: is Z. Keybinds can be edited in controls at any time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_3: Only one Freyr Sword entity may excist at a time.
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_4: Quitting the game will permanently place it on that
tooltip.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_note_5: spot until someone picks it up and bounds to it again.
tooltip.soulsweapons.grand_skyfall_descr: - Use in off-hand to ¬ß3Riptide¬ßr the user,
then upon landing, smash the ground, damaging
all mobs in a radius based on falling distance.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_descript: - When the user is under ¬ßc50% Health¬ßr, gain
tooltip.soulsweapons.luminate_descriptio: - Lights up when hostiles are around
tooltip.soulsweapons.featherlight_descri: - Inscribed runes makes the weapon light, resulting in high
attack speed while gaining the benefits of a heavy greatsword.
tooltip.soulsweapons.doom_description_1: - Has massive attack damage for the next
tooltip.soulsweapons.doom_description_2: strike, then will go on cooldown.
tooltip.soulsweapons.transformation_desc: - Killing mobs harvests their souls, distinguishing
¬ßbBlue¬ßr and ¬ßcRed¬ßr souls based on whether the mob
was passive, wielding a ranged weapon, or whether the
mob was a hostile monster. Each number of souls increases
the damage of the weapon. When reaching max number of
souls, the item transforms based on the dominant soul type.
Enchants will carry over to the transforming weapon.
tooltip.soulsweapons.early_combat_descri: - For the first given seconds in combat, gain increased
damage and movement speed post hit.
Time can be changed in config. Current time in seconds:
tooltip.soulsweapons.umbral_trespass_des: - Use while in combat to enter the soul of the target.
In this state, the user takes no damage. On dismount,
the user leaps out, and the target is dealt heavy damage.
tooltip.soulsweapons.trick_weapon_descri: - Use keybind to transform the weapon if in main hand.
Default keybind is B, this can be changed in controls.
tooltip.soulsweapons.heavy_weapon_descri: - Gain ¬ß6Haste¬ßr post hit while having ¬ß4Strength¬ßr effect.
tooltip.soulsweapons.righteous_descripti: Scales with Fire Aspect, current bonus:
tooltip.soulsweapons.detonate_spears_des: - Press ability keybind with this in hand to strike the ground,
damaging all nearby mobs and detonating all previously
thrown ¬ß6Draupnir Spears¬ßr that exist with explosion power
At power level over 2, all nearby targets are
tooltip.soulsweapons.keybind_ability: Ability Keybind is LEFT_ALT by default, can be changed in controls.
tooltip.soulsweapons.moonfall_descriptio: - Charge the weapon and smash the ground, causing
ruptures down the aimed path with distance based
tooltip.soulsweapons.charge_description_: - Will add ¬ßbCharge¬ßr to weapon post hit.
tooltip.soulsweapons.need_charge_descrip: - This weapons needs ¬ßbCharge¬ßr to use the ability.
Upon usage, all ¬ßbCharge¬ßr will be consumed.
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_1: While this is in off-hand, press keybind
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_2: to attempt a parry to ¬ßcPosture Break¬ßr an
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_3: opponent that tries to damage you.
tooltip.soulsweapons.parry_description_4: Parry Keybind is RIGHT_ALT by default,
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_dark.part: This soul has seen the light, but in the end, it
succumbed to the urges of the dark power
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_red.part_: Purest form of the the soul. This soul comes from
someone who wished to change the world, but
ultimately met their demise after it's failure.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_void.part: Soul of the abyss, the void itself, of all things.
The power of limbo is in your hands.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_purple.pa: A rare form of souls, thought to be extinct.
It's dark, but balanced color, suggests
the user has lived for centuries.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_white.par: So close to purity, yet there is a glimpse of
darkness within. You feel a frighteningly
strong sense of ambition. He is not done.
tooltip.soulsweapons.lord_soul_day_stalk: You feel a sense of relief. Finally,
it has been freed from it's shackles.
tooltip.soulsweapons.essence_of_eventide: You feel a strong sense of longing, as if it
desperately wants to return to something.
tooltip.soulsweapons.essence_of_luminesc: To think such a powerful being could be so
easily persuaded. What will come of this
world if only the sun will show us the way?
tooltip.soulsweapons.withered_demon_hear: There is no beating, there is no blood. All life
has been drained a long time ago. What could
possibly drive the corpse to stand it's ground?
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_1: It's so bright, yet you feel the dark void as you touch
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_2: it, like something is held captive. It calls your name.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_3: Try not to stare too much into the glimmering abyss,
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenstone.part_4: unless you want the same fate as it's predecessor.
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_1: As a desperate attempt to become immortal, the Icon fused
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_2: the accursed Arkenstone with his own armor and soul, but
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_3: after unforeseen events, he was cast away from his shell,
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_4: doomed to wander the lands endlessly as a mere shade of his
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_5: former glory. Although, the seal of soulbound was never closed,
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_6: so any lost soul could enter his former body, and potentially
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_7: gain a fraction of his power, but what would happen if the true
tooltip.soulsweapons.arkenplate_lore_8: soul were to return to the shell?
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_1: With all knowledge gone with time, it is impossible to know if
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_2: the Monarch's intentions were always so evil. Not much remains
tooltip.soulsweapons.chaos_crown_lore_3: of his own empire either, after all...
tooltip.soulsweapons.shard_of_uncertaint: It seems to perfectly fit in a certain pedestal...
enchantment.soulsweapons.fast_hands.desc: Reduce charge time for Guns and Bows (model doesn't change).
enchantment.soulsweapons.visceral.desc: Increases chance for Posture Break on Silver Bullets, halfed for Arrows.
enchantment.soulsweapons.stagger.desc: Chance to heavily slow targets a short while.
key.soulsweapons.freyr_sword_stationary: Freyr Sword switch between stationary or guarding
key.soulsweapons.collect_summons_soul_re: Collect summons back to Soul Harvesting item if in hand
advancements.soulsweapons.root.title: Soulslike Weaponry
advancements.soulsweapons.moonstone.desc: Acquire a moonstone, gems shinier than diamonds!
advancements.soulsweapons.bluemoon_tools: Create weapons of the finest gems, the only thing they need now is raw power...
advancements.soulsweapons.moonlight_tool: Enhance the weapons to their prime
advancements.soulsweapons.pure_moonlight: Enhance the greatsword beyond it's prime
advancements.soulsweapons.lord_soul.desc: Acquire a Lord Soul, the remnants of their excistence
advancements.soulsweapons.heap_of_iron.d: Acquire the Dragonslayer, the heap of raw iron
advancements.soulsweapons.bloodthirsty.d: Use the Bloodthirster while being Bloodthirsty
advancements.soulsweapons.nightfall.desc: Acquire the Nightfall and command your own undead army!
advancements.soulsweapons.lords_on_stick: Acquire the Dragon Staff, and it's chaotic counterpart the Withered Wabbajack
advancements.soulsweapons.rageblade.desc: Acquire Guinsoo's Rageblade, attack at light speed!
advancements.soulsweapons.dragonslayer_s: Acquire Dragonslayer Swordspear. Behold! The Power of the Heavens!
advancements.soulsweapons.whirligig_sawb: Rip and Tear... until it is done.
Acquire the Whirligig Sawblade. Shred your foes out of excistence!
advancements.soulsweapons.blunderbuss.de: Craft the Hunter Blunderbuss, the bigger the blast, the bigger the damage!
Craft the Hunter Pistol, a simple, but powerful gun
advancements.soulsweapons.gatling_gun.de: Craft the Gatling Gun and watch it drain all your ammunition in an instant
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.title: Maybe a little over the top?
advancements.soulsweapons.cannon.descrip: Craft the Hunter Cannon, aim for the sparrows and unleash a devastating blast!
advancements.soulsweapons.all_weapons.de: Acquire all the Legendary Weapons from this mod
advancements.soulsweapons.draugr_boss.de: Defeat the Old Champion and the creature that has possessed it's remains
advancements.soulsweapons.ender_of_world: The End of the World Ender
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.title: False Water
advancements.soulsweapons.verglas.descri: Aquire Verglas, a cold, smooth material that seems to have some particular liquid trapped inside
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.title: Dream On
advancements.soulsweapons.dream_on.descr: Fall at least 50 blocks and survive thanks to Calculated Fall status effect.
advancements.soulsweapons.moonknight.des: Return the Essence of Eventide to it's rightful body, and defeat the godlike being that appears.
advancements.soulsweapons.trickweapon.de: Acquire your first trickweapon, a weapon that can transform itself into other weaponry!
advancements.soulsweapons.transform_scyt: Feed the Darkin Scythe enough souls to transform itself into a new empowered form.
